### Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Packages 

library(tidyverse)
library(haven)

```

### Data 

#### Data loading

```{r}

yearrange = 1999:2020

for (year in yearrange){
  assign(
    paste("Tobacco",year),
    read_sas(
      paste(
        "https://www.cdc.gov/tobacco/data_statistics/surveys/nyts/zip_files/",
        year,'/',year,
        "-nyts-dataset-and-codebook-sas.zip"
      )
    )
  )
}
```
